name: mblwhoi_capistrano
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Provides Chef definition for creating a capistrano user.

Note: this could probably be taken care of with one of the Opscode user cookbooks, like http://community.opscode.com/cookbooks/users .

But I was unable to test data bags with chef-solo, so I wrote this.
